message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value at $12,000 to you. I understand its importance and would like to offer it to you at a special price considering its worth to you. My offer for this exceptional product is $10,000. I believe this is a fair deal that respects both the value of the product and your budget. Please let me know if this proposal suits your needs, and we can proceed with the transaction.
